page.title: 02PETERCULTER & MILLTIMBER
page.content: { {TOWNS Peterculter & Milltimber are 2 small towns situated within the area we observed. In Peterculter many new housing developments have been built, e.g. Cala homes. There is one school in Peterculter and one in Milltimber. They are both primary schools. There is also an American primary school. The shops in Peterculter are small and there are not very many. There are no shops in Milltimber.{ { {EMPLOYMENT} Most people in Peterculter are retired,but some people work in Peterculter,others work in Aberdeen. The people who work in Culter are mainly farmers,teachers,doctors,or have their own business. BY LISA MACRAE & SUSAN MILLER.
